Cc iu Khon Thu Ca o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng (ACA)

o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng bao gm cc ci cch ton din v bo him y t v bao gm cc iu khon thu nh hng n cc c nhn, gia nh, doanh nghip, cng ty bo him, cc t chc c min thu v cc t chc chnh ph. Cc iu khon thu (ting Anh) ny c nhng thay i quan trng, bao gm cch cc c nhn v gia nh khai thu. Lut cng bao gm nhng quyn li c hng v trch nhim i vi cc t chc khc v hng s. iu khon thu (ting Anh) C Nhn & Gia nh C Nhn & Gia nh Lut yu cu qu v v nhng ngi ph thuc ca qu v phi c bo him chm sc sc khe. Nu qu v mua bo him t Th Trng Bo Him Sc Khe (ting Anh) th qu v c th iu kin nhn Tn Thu Bo Ph (ting Anh). Th Trng Bo Him Sc Khe (ting Anh) Tn Thu Bo Ph (ting Anh) Hng s Hng s o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng bao gm cc yu cu i vi hng s lin quan n bo him chm sc sc khe. Quy m v c cu ca lc lng lao ng ca qu v quyt nh trch nhim ca qu v. Nu qu v khng c nhn vin, thng tin ny s khng p dng cho qu v. ng Dn Lin Quan Trung Tm Thng Tin ACA Dnh Cho Chuyn Gia Thu (ting Anh) iu Khon Trch Nhim Chung Ca C Nhn (ting Anh) Tn Thu Bo Ph (ting Anh) Tn Thu Chm Sc Sc Khe Cho Doanh Nghip Nh (ting Anh) iu Khon V Trch Nhim Chung Ca Hng S (ting Anh) Khai Bo Thng Tin Ca Cc Hng S Ln p Dng (ting Anh) Khai Bo Thng Tin Ca Nh Cung Cp Bo Him (ting Anh) Bn K Khai D Kin Khai Thu - Chng trnh AIR (ting Anh) HealthCare .gov (ting Anh) HealthCare Mu, Th v n Phm ca o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng Mu 8962, Tn Thu Bo Ph (ting Anh) PDF n Phm 5187, o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng: Nhng iu Qu V V Gia nh Qu V Cn Bit (ting Anh) PDF Hiu R Th 226-J Gi Cho Qu V (ting Anh) Hiu R Th 227 Gi Cho Qu V (ting Anh)
